description:
Kischur Zelretch Schweinorg is one of five living magicians capable of true magic beyond modern science or magecraft. He has control over the Second Magic, "Kaleidoscope", which allows for the "Operation of Parallel Worlds." He fought and defeated Brunestud of the Crimson Moon, the king of vampires, but was bitten in the process and became a Dead Apostle Ancestor, a vampire, thus attaining immortality.
He is one of the few characters who appear in more than one of the stories of the Nasuverse, appearing in http://anidb.net/a1015 [Tsukihime] manga and Prologue in the Plus Period artbook, and the Heaven`s Feel scenario of http://anidb.net/a3348 [Fate/stay night].
He supervised the creation of the Holy Grail War ritual, and was a master to the heads of Makiri, Toosaka and Einzbern families at the time.
Source: typemoon.wikia.com
name: Kischur Zelretch Schweinorg
